metadata.title: jenkins-2-plugins: Path traversal vulnerability in HTML Publisher Plugin (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in jenkins-2-plugins. The HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier archives invalid symbolic links in report directories on agents and recreates them on the controller. Attackers with Item/Configure permission can use them to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists, without being able to access it.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
